name: Roll Dome
description:
The final battle of the condiments is here!

Stretch your muscles, gather your wits and be prepared to Roll a Dice. The winner can be only one and only one shall obtain the ultimate, beautiful, shiny and fabulous Golden Roll!

In local PvP multiplayer you must stand against your opponent in platforming arena and win the prize for yourself. If you want to win, you need lucky and strong hands to throw the dice. Into the opponent's face of course! The dice also have some spicy features, which can be very helpful in the heat of battle!

Who shall be the best condiment? Ketchup, or Mustard?

CONTROLS
Mustard Chef 
AD - move
W - jump / double jump
F - grab the die / throw the die

Ketchup Chef 
arrowLeft/Right - move
aroowUp - jump / double jump
rShift - grab the die / throw the die

MADE BY
Antonín Holík @TondaFSCZ
Kuba Špiřík @KubaSpirik
Karel Vaněk
